name: Stock Block Beta v7.0
description:
The Stock Market is a very interesting thing. It changes every day and people make a lot of money playing it. There are other virtual stock market games out there, but they are all real time games. Real-time games take months or even years to play. That's why I created this game. To put simply, it's a stock market simulator that is made mainly for educational purposes.

Over time I will update this specific version of the game. I'll eventually add in past stock value lookups as well as many more stocks. I will finish the tutorial later, but you can click around to figure stuff out. Enjoy!
